short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab page into a calming appealing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab page into a calming and visually appealing experience with Nature Inspired New Tab. This extension features:

- A serene nature background with vibrant details.
- A clean and intuitive design with quick access to popular websites such as Google, - -- Amazon, Gmail, YouTube, and more.
- Real-time clock and date display for better time management.
- A customizable news feed for staying updated.
- The ability to change backgrounds and personalize the page to match your style.
Reconnect with nature every time you open a new tab!
